column5: A great 2016 to all of your families and friends. There will be bumps in the road for some this year as there is every year but I'm confident that our community will pull together and try to smooth those bumps. That's the great part of this community that I'm a proud member of.  The important thing to remember is that we must try to stay healthy and happy....anything else you may want will fall into place.  Thanks everyone for letting me be a small part of it. Be well, all of you.   ps. Don't forget, fishing is still our raison d'Ãªtre.
Happy New Year Roy and all the Best.
Roy...wonderful words!  I hope you have a great new year as well!
Happy New Year Roy, J and family. Wishing you much good health and happiness. Hope to see you in 2016!
Yes Roy a Happy and Healthy Year in 2016 to all.  Any fishing time is just gravy.
All the best to you and everyone else on the OFC board in 2016 Roy!
Such Excellent words Roy, all the best to you and your family and all the best to my friends and family here at OFC
This has always been a great place to participate and belong too.  Kudos to yourself Roy, TJ and the others who made and keep it what it is.  Best to everyone for 2016 and beyond.
Happy New Year Roy!  This group of OFCers is awesome!
